title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
tagline: Get radiant and glowing skin with our potent Vitamin C serum!
description: Say goodbye to dull skin and hello to a brighter, more even-toned complexion. Our GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is formulated with 10% Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid to provide long-lasting hydration and brightening benefits.
usage_guide: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.
safety_info: Mild tingling may occur for sensitive skin. Discontinue use if irritation persists.
